item.title: 欧洲央行将再次降息，但紧张局势给未来之路蒙上阴影
item.description: 欧洲中央银行即将自 6 月以来第六次降低利率，尽管动荡的经济背景正在引发借贷成本何去何从的分歧。【原文：The European Central Bank is about to lower interest rates for the sixth time since June, though a volatile economic backdrop is sowing divisions over where to take borrowing costs from here.】

item.title: 看跌押注退却，JD.com 季度销售额将大幅增长
item.description: 在中国政府消费者以旧换新补贴政策的推动下，这家中国在线零售商将于周四公布创纪录的季度销售额。【原文：Short sellers are backing away from JD.com Inc. shares, with the Chinese online retailer set to report record quarterly sales on Thursday, fueled by Beijing’s consumer trade-in subsidies.】

item.title: 伯南克称近期物价上涨可能影响通胀控制
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会前主席本-伯南克（Ben Bernanke）说，世界近期经历的较快通胀可能会使各国央行今后更难控制物价。【原文：The world’s recent experience of faster inflation may make it harder for central banks to control prices in future, former US Federal Reserve Chair Ben Bernanke said.】

item.title: 关税影响需求前景，石油价格维持在六个月低点附近
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税引发了多方面的贸易战，引发了人们对能源需求前景的担忧，石油维持在六个月来的最低水平附近。【原文：Oil held near the lowest level in six months as President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs opened up trade wars on multiple fronts, raising concerns about the outlook for energy demand.】

item.title: 美联储主席佩里称债务限额动态可能扰乱货币市场
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的罗伯托-佩里（Roberto Perli）表示，目前的债务上限僵局可能会威胁到美联储正在进行的资产负债表缩减，导致央行负债的波动，从而造成货币市场利率的波动。【原文：The current debt-ceiling impasse could threaten the Federal Reserve’s ongoing balance-sheet runoff causing gyrations in the central bank’s liabilities that create volatility in money-market rates, according to Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s Roberto Perli.】

item.title: 特朗普发布命令后，Salesforce 将终止多元化招聘目标
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统签署了一系列旨在取消联邦政府和私营部门多元化招聘计划的行政命令后，Salesforce 公司将终止多元化招聘目标。【原文：Salesforce Inc. is ending diversity goals in hiring after President Donald Trump signed a series of executive orders aimed at eliminating such programs across the federal government and the private sector.】

item.title: 能源和食品价格稳定，韩国通胀缓解
item.description: 由于能源和食品价格保持稳定，韩国的消费通胀有所放缓，这为在唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动升级之际将政策重点转向支持经济的官员们提供了信心。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation moderated as energy and food prices remained stable, offering confidence to officials who have shifted their policy focus to supporting the economy as Donald Trump’s tariff campaign escalates.】

item.title: 新西兰住宅建筑连续第九个季度下降
item.description: 上一季度，新西兰住宅建设下滑至四年多来的最低点，这表明经济从衰退中反弹的幅度将不大。【原文：New Zealand residential construction slid to the lowest in more than four years last quarter, suggesting the economy’s rebound from recession will be modest.】

item.title: 特朗普关税缓和后亚洲股市将攀升：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普同意推迟对墨西哥和加拿大新征收的汽车制造商税，华尔街股市上涨，亚洲股市周四将攀升。德国债券因国防开支增加而大幅抛售。【原文：Asian equities were set to climb Thursday after Wall Street rose as US President Donald Trump agreed to a delay on newly imposed automaker levies on Mexico and Canada. German bonds sold sharply on higher defense spending.】

item.title: 英国与爱尔兰达成数据协议以提升能源安全
item.description: 英国和爱尔兰计划共享更多数据并减少繁文缛节，以加强能源安全，因为在英国脱欧后多年的紧张局势之后，两国寻求建立更紧密的关系。【原文：The UK and Ireland plan to share more data and slash red tape in a bid to boost energy security as thee two countries seek a tighter relationship after years of post-Brexit tension.】

item.title: 伯克希尔的崇拜者、关税和人工智能成为华尔街专业人士的热门话题
item.description: 另类投资的最新趋势是试图模仿沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的企业集团伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：The newest trend in alternative investing is trying to look like Warren Buffett’s conglomerate, Berkshire Hathaway Inc.】

item.title: 另类投资蓬勃发展，日盛资产加大招聘力度
item.description: 日本最大保险公司的资产管理部门将扩大其管理私募股权和其他另类投资的团队，以期待市场更强劲的增长。【原文：The asset management arm of Japan’s largest insurer will expand its team managing private equity and other alternative investments, betting on more strong growth in the market.】

item.title: 资通公司与印度尼西亚财富基金合作寻找投资机会
item.description: 根据一份联合声明，战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.【原文：Ares Management Corp. has teamed up with an Indonesian sovereign wealth fund to explore investment opportunities in the country, according to a joint statement.】

item.description:

item.title: 增长预测低于最乐观预期，Marvell 公司业绩下滑
item.description: Marvell Technology Inc. 公布的营收预期低于最高预期，令期待从人工智能热潮中获得更大回报的投资者感到失望，因此在尾盘交易中下跌。【原文：Marvell Technology Inc. declined in late trading after delivering a revenue forecast that fell short of the highest estimates, disappointing investors who were looking for a bigger payoff from the AI boom.】

item.title: 美国炼油厂对墨西哥原油的订单减少
item.description: 即使在唐纳德-特朗普总统本周实施关税之前，美国墨西哥湾沿岸的炼油厂就已经减少了对墨西哥原油的订单。【原文：US Gulf Coast refineries had already been placing fewer orders for crude oil from Mexico even ahead of President Donald Trump’s tariffs put in place this week.】

item.title: Grindr 未能实现第四季度盈利和 2025 年利润率展望
item.description: Grindr Inc. 公布的第四季度财报不及预期，2025 年利润率预期也低于预期，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌。【原文：Grindr Inc. reported weaker-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and gave a 2025 margin forecast that also fell short of estimates, sending the stock down in extended trading.】

item.title: 尽管增长面临风险，马来西亚仍将维持关键利率不变
item.description: 马来西亚准备在周四继续维持利率不变，在美国推出可能损害这个贸易依赖型国家的大范围关税之际，为其政策储备弹药。【原文：Malaysia is poised to continue keeping its rate unchanged on Thursday, saving its policy ammunition as the US rolls out wide-ranging tariffs that could hurt the trade-reliant nation.】

item.title: Oasis 称投资者支持花王公司董事会变动建议
item.description: 激进基金 Oasis Management Co. 表示，该基金提出的改组日本化妆品和化学公司花王董事会的建议得到了其他投资者的大力支持。【原文：Activist fund Oasis Management Co. said there is huge support from other investors for its proposal to shake up the board of Japanese cosmetics and chemical company Kao Corp.】

item.title: 人工智能基金，每周四天工作制：投资者称炒作是真实的
item.description: 无论企业是投资人工智能基础设施，还是利用人工智能为业务减脂，一些全球顶级金融高管都发出了这样的信息：要么加入，要么失败。【原文：Whether firms are investing in AI infrastructure or using it to trim fat out of their businesses, the message from some of the world’s top financial executives: Jump in or lose out.】

item.title: On The Border 成为最新破产的连锁餐厅
item.description: On The Border Mexican Grill & Cantina 成为美国最新一家申请破产的休闲餐饮连锁店，原因是劳动力成本激增、客流量下降和通胀压力。【原文：On The Border Mexican Grill & Cantina became the latest US casual-dining chain to file for bankruptcy amid surging labor costs, falling customer traffic and inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 艾伯塔省将削减美国酒精，改变采购以报复特朗普
item.description: 加拿大阿尔伯塔省正在立即停止采购美国酒类，并改变其采购规则，以应对唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税，同时集中更长期的努力，向其他市场出口更多的石油和天然气。【原文：The Canadian province of Alberta is immediately halting purchases of US alcohol and changing its procurement rules to respond to President Donald Trump’s tariffs, while focusing longer-term efforts to export more oil and gas to other markets.】

item.title: Venture Global 在能源行业最糟糕的大型 IPO 之后面临盈利考验
item.description: Venture Global 公司即将迎来其作为上市公司的首次财报电话会议，该公司有一个令人怀疑的殊荣：它是至少在过去 30 年中表现最差的大型能源 IPO。【原文：Venture Global Inc. is approaching its first corporate earnings call as a public company bearing a dubious distinction: it is the worst-performing large energy IPO in at least the last 30 years.】

item.title: 沃尔格林 LBO 迫使渴望收费的银行和私人信贷联合起来
item.description: 在缺乏新交易的情况下，缺乏资金的投资银行家和私人信贷机构对沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Amid a dearth of new deals, fee-starved investment bankers and private credit lenders are salivating over the prospect of Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. going private in one of the largest leveraged buyouts since the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 期权市场显示交易员对欧元的乐观情绪有时间限制
item.description: 货币期权交易员们表示，在贸易战威胁持续加深的情况下，欧元的看涨势头可能不会持续到未来几周。【原文：Currency-options traders are signaling that the euro’s bullish momentum may not last past the coming weeks amid the lingering threat of a deepening trade war.】

item.title: 贸易战使美国 1,200 万吨农作物的销售受到威胁
item.description: 由于中国和加拿大已经对唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税进行了反击，而且人们担心更多的报复措施正在酝酿之中，农产品贸易商目前正在关注可能取消的合同，这将使大约 1200 万吨美国农作物的销售面临风险。【原文：With China and Canada already hitting back against President Donald Trump’s tariffs and concerns over more retaliation in the works, agriculture traders are now watching for potential cancellations on contracts that would put roughly 12 million tons of American crop sales at risk.】

item.title: 价格上涨，新西兰住房市场显现生机
item.description: 据新西兰核心逻辑公司（CoreLogic New Zealand）的数据显示，2月份新西兰住房市场略显生机，房价涨幅为一年多来最大。【原文：New Zealand’s housing market showed slight signs of life in February as prices rose the most in more than a year, according to CoreLogic New Zealand.】

item.title: 布克勒计划继续购买比特币，无视国际货币基金组织的阻挠
item.description: 萨尔瓦多总统纳伊布-布凯莱（Nayib Bukele）表示，即使在与国际货币基金组织签署了一项预计将停止数字货币积累的协议之后，萨尔瓦多政府仍将继续购买比特币。【原文：El Salvador’s President Nayib Bukele said his government would continue to buy Bitcoin even after inking a deal with the International Monetary Fund that was expected to halt accumulation of the digital currency.】

item.title: 美股超级泡沫即将破灭？
item.description: 特朗普政府的早期行动长期采取被视为刺激通胀和抑制增长的政策措施，但迄今为止尚未采取抵消性减税措施。这让很多人对经济衰退和市场风险敲响了警钟。特朗普总统则在昨晚对国会表示："会有一点骚动，但我们没问题。不会有太大影响"。我们应该相信他吗？【原文：The Trump administration’s early actions have been long on policy measures seen as stoking inflation and curbing growth, without the offsetting tax relief as of yet. This has a lot of people raising alarms about recession and market risks. For his part, President Trump told Congress last night, “There’ll be a little disturbance, but we’re OK with that. It won’t be much.” Should we believe him though?】
